items.name: Kraken Remnant
explicitMods: 4% chance to receive additional Jewellery when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
6% chance to receive additional Talismans when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
22% chance in Heists for Chromatic Orbs to drop as Orbs of Fusing instead
2% chance in Heists for Regal Orbs to drop as Divine Orbs instead
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this
